passive.description_source: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining Move Speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.
passive.description: Gain bonus move speed while facing a nearby enemy champion, increased during Final Hour; persists briefly after losing sight.

effects.description: Bonus movement speed while facing nearby enemy champion
effects.context_notes: Bonus movement speed is flat, not percent. Persists 2 seconds after losing sight.

effects.description: Bonus movement speed during Final Hour
Bonus duration after losing sight of enemy champion

passive.name: Night Hunter

basic_ability_3.name: Condemn
basic_ability_3.description_source: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
basic_ability_3.context_notes: Missile speed is 2200/2000; knockback distance 475 units. Cast time 0.25s.

effects.description: Bonus physical damage if target hits terrain

basic_ability_3.description: Knock back an enemy; if they collide with terrain, deal bonus damage and stun for 1.5s.

basic_ability_2.name: Silver Bolts
basic_ability_2.description_source: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's max health as bonus true damage.

effects.description: Bonus true damage based on target max health
Bonus true damage cap vs monsters

basic_ability_2.description: Every third attack on the same target deals bonus true damage based on target max health (with a minimum value) and has a monster cap.

basic_ability_1.name: Tumble
basic_ability_1.description_source: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack deals bonus damage.
basic_ability_1.context_notes: Dash speed is 500 + total movement speed. Tumble resets basic attack timer.

effects.context_notes: Bonus damage scales off total AD by rank (75% to 115%) plus 50% AP.
effects.description: Bonus physical damage on next basic attack

basic_ability_1.description: Dash and empower your next basic attack within 3s to deal bonus physical damage based on total AD and ability power.

ultimate.name: Final Hour
ultimate.description_source: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, reduced Tumble cooldown, and more bonus Move Speed from Night Hunter
ultimate.context_notes: While active, Night Hunter bonus movement speed is tripled.

effects.context_notes: Must score a takedown within 3 seconds of damaging the enemy champion.

ultimate.description: Empower yourself for a duration with bonus attack damage; Tumble has reduced cooldown and grants brief invisibility. Takedowns extend the duration. Night Hunter bonus movement speed is tripled during the effect.

name: Vayne
notes: Scaling coefficients are not included in Data Dragon spell vars for these files; only base values are represented.
Where leveltip labels exist, base values are mapped into effects with formula terms using base_by_rank.
Scaling coefficients were supplemented from wiki ability data templates where available.
Ability values and scalings for Vayne were verified against the League of Legends Wiki ability data templates.

sources.used_for: base stats, base ability values, cooldowns, costs

sources.type: League of Legends Wiki (ability data template)
League of Legends Wiki (ability data template)
League of Legends Wiki (ability data template)
League of Legends Wiki (ability data template)
League of Legends Wiki (ability data template)

sources.used_for: basic attack windup and missile speed
raw basic attack timing stats and radii

schema_notes.base_by_champion_level: Array of base values by champion level tiers (as defined by the game).
schema_notes.value_percent: A fixed percentage value (stored as percent, not decimal).

basic_attack.windup_percent: Percent of attack period spent in windup.
basic_attack.calculation_notes: Explains how derived values were computed.
basic_attack.missile_speed: Projectile speed for ranged basic attacks (units per second); null for melee.

schema_notes.ratio_type: Defines how a ratio is interpreted relative to the specified resource or stat.

formula.contextual_multipliers: Optional. Used when the result depends on context like target type.
formula.op: Operation applied to all terms. Common: add, multiply.

terms.source: Optional. References a base array like base_by_rank or base_by_champion_level.
terms.input_stat: Optional. The stat used for scaling (e.g., ability_power, bonus_health).
coefficient_type: per_point: linear scaling per 1 point of input_stat.
percent_of_stat: input_stat * coefficient, where coefficient is a percent as a decimal.
percent_per_100_stat: coefficient applied per 100 of input_stat.
multiplier: used when the input_stat is a value to be multiplied directly (e.g., damage_dealt).

formula.output_stat: The stat produced by this formula (e.g., magic_damage, heal, bonus_health).

schema_notes.base_by_rank: Array of base values by ability rank (1-5).
schema_notes.basic_attack_raw_timing_stats: Raw timing values from generated data (attackCastTime, attackDelayOffset, attackTotalTime, attackSpeedRatio, acquisitionRadius, gameplayRadius).
